breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Strength Training Equipment › Home Gym Systems
features: 【30-in-1 Home Gym Station】: Owning a GMWD LG01 gym station is like having multiple workout machines in a single: Lat pulldown station/2:1 ratio Low row station (includes footplate attachment)/Bicep curls machine/Upright rows machine/Bench press machine/ Squat Machine/ Shoulder press machine/Dips machine/Core trainer. Leverage gym equipment is a fantastic choice for building upper and lower body strength in your home gym.

【Compact & Cost Saving Choice】: With only a 23SQFT footprint you can have most of the features you might need in a home gym instead of 9 separate gym equipment. Designed with 2 weight plate storage horns holding up to 250 lbs. The perfect fit for your Home Gym or any commercial facility.

【Safety First】: Safety is always our priority, 2mm thick metal is ensuring stability and solid construction. We even used 5mm thick metal on some stress points. Also, we are offering aircraft-grade cables for our pulley system which could support you to a new weight level! The Lever arms have built-in safety stops that allow users to train to exhaustion without the use of a spotter. This security provides the opportunity to achieve maximum muscle growth in the comfort of your own home.

【2:1 Ratio】: GMWD LG01 provides a 2:1 ratio lat/low row system(Load capacity 280lbs) for heavier resistance, and it works great for 90% cable exercises. You will enjoy a full range of lat pull-downs. Leverage Gym is practical for your everyday needs!

【Versatile Design】Two Arms(each arm starting weight is12lbs) can be used with the connecting bar, which locks them together for Squats, deadlifts, shrugs, Calf Raises, and other basic compound movements or used without connecting bar for more isolated independent movements, such as alternate flat/incline/decline chest press, shoulder press and more. Also when locked together the arms form a great station for heavy dips. Feel free to explore more movements by yourself!

【Product Dimensions】GMWD leverage machine overall size:60”(W)×55”(L)×81”(H). Gross weight:207lbs. Each Lever Arm Starting Weight:23lbs. Connecting bar Starting Weight: 5.4lbs. Weight capacity:2055lbs. Recommended ceiling height: 81-87". We provide professional assemble tools and instructions, more efficient and easier.
The Leverage Advantage: The use of lever arms creates the smoothest motion in any weight training machine and is the closest thing to free weights.

ADJUSTABLE FEATURES: Dual overhead resistance cams allow for an independent range of motion for singular rows and collaboratively in unilateral or bilateral conditioning. The swiveling arms offer optimal pectoral and rear deltoid development which provides users with a deep, full-stretch workout.

COMFORTABLE PADDING: The Fly Machine features thick, comfortable padding that will reduce strain and stress on your muscles as you lift weights. The comfortable pads are found on both the seat and back.

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from durable, 2 x 2-inch, 12-gauge steel tubing, this upper body machine features aluminum pulleys, a firm foam padding, and a powder-coated finish, and rubber feet with bolt-down hole options for concrete anchors.

DIMENSIONS: The 109-pound Fly Machine provides an overall height of 65-inches and a length and width of 32 x 28-inches. The 10-inch loadable sleeves have a diameter of 49mm and will fit any Olympic-sized weight plates with a weight capacity of up to 300-pounds.

Perform such as exercises as lat pull downs, triceps press downs, ab crunches, leg curls, leg extensions, chest press, seated rows, cable curls, upright rows, and more at the 5 different stations. Measuring 84 by 61 by 38 inches assembled, the PHG1000X offers a multiple station design in an economically sized footprint. The PHG1000X features a patented press arm system that functions as a chest press station and at the same time replicates the pectoral dumbbell fly. Coming complete with a lat bar, a straight bar, and a utility strap, the PHG1000X offers numerous high pulley, low pulley, and leg extension/ leg curl exercises. Take your workouts to a higher level by adding an optional 150-pound selectorized weight stack. The easy selector pin saves time and energy and still allows you to add standard weight plates when you want even great challenge. ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE & CUSTOMIZATION: Tailor your workout to your specific goals with the Powerline Home Gym's adjustable resistance settings. With the ability to accommodate a range of weight plates, you can easily increase or decrease the intensity of your workout, ensuring progressive training and continued strength gains.

EXERCISES: Use this home gym to complete a variety of full body workouts (pec fly, bench, incline, standing military and decline press, pull over, upright row wide and close grip front lat pulldowns and pull up, ab crunch, back extension bicep and leg curls, tricep press down and kickback, leg extension, glute kick.

DIMENSIONS: The Powerline Home Gym is engineered with high-quality materials ensuring durability for long-lasting use, and its sleek, compact design fits perfectly in smaller spaces, making it an ideal choice for those with limited room who still want a comprehensive workout at home. Measures 61"x42"x84" and weighs 118lbs.

Turn Your Home into a Powerhouse 
For more than 15 years Powerline Strength Training Equipment has been saving people from the expense, travel time, and hassle of joining a gym. From the privacy of your own home you can perform the same exercises to trim, tone, and sculpt your body into your ultimate vision, on your own schedule.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Uses patented, "Arc Movement" for full range of motion to rapidly develop a bigger, stronger, leaner chest. 
Customized resistance levels suits beginners to expert bodybuilders. 
Fully assembled machine is portable and easy to store. 
How does it work? 
Iron Chest Master is designed to keep joints protected while maximizing growth of chest, shoulders, triceps, upper back and abs. All the way through the movement from push-up through the peak contraction, your body is stable with no damaging rotation of the wrists or shoulder joints. 
Are the resistance bands adjustable or universal? 
The resistance bands of the Iron Chest Master are adjustable -- resistance ranging from 60 lbs to 120+ lbs. Resistance bands can be individually substituted in order to customize the resistance level of the machine to suit the individual user. 
What are the dimensions and weight? 
Iron Chest Master is 48" x 6" x 4" and the weight is 7 lbs. 
How much weight can it hold? 
The bearings on the machine can hold up to 300 lbs. per handle, so a total of 600 lbs. of pressure. It would be almost impossible to place that type of stress on the machine.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
After continuous improvement and upgrading, Chest fly machine 2.0 (Black) is here! Pick it and get your the first time experience that you can really feel your pec or rear delts kicking in and fatigue! 
What is the Sweet Spot of this Isolated Pec Fly Machine? 
Its increased stability provides more focus and juice to the targeted muscles because stabilizing muscles are not used. Due to your path of motion is fixed. Essentially, you can hone in on the muscle for added volume and activation. 
How this Machine Helps You to Build a Nice-Shaping Rear Delts? 
It isolates the rear delts and muscles of the upper back without using stabilizing muscles of the lower body. You also use the pad to rest your chest against for leverage, which allows you to reverse fly with a greater load. 
Pec and Rear Delt machine vs Function trainer! Why do you shoulder-pick this for a Chest or Rear Delt Workout? 
It is a plate-load and fixed machine movement with no deviation so you can hit the targeted your aim muscle group for better hypertrophy benefits. 
Pec and Rear Delt Machine vs. Dumbbell! Why you Should Pick this Machine for Chest or Rear Delt Workout? 
If you are a beginner, getting dumbbells up in a position to perform butterflies is pretty hard and you will not feel your pec or rear delts kicking in and fatigue. But this fixed path machine will perfectly solve this issue. 
Can You Adjust the Height of This Chest Machine? I’m 5.6ft, I am not Sure if This Fits? 
[All Height Friendly] Yeah,i'm 6.2ft and it works fine to me. This one comes with adjustable seats, allowing you to set the height to suit your exercise requirements and body size.

title: GMWD SmithΔ Machine Power Cage, 2500LBS Power Rack with Cable Crossver System, Multi-User Workout Cage with Functional Trainer, Pull-Up Bar, Spotter Arms, Home Gym Equipment for Family Training
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Strength Training Equipment › Racks & Cages › Smith Machines
features: DUAL-SIDED OMNI TRAINER: Owning a double-sided SmithΔ Machine is like having an entire gym in one compact unit. This versatile machine combines multiple workout stations, including a SmithΔ machine, a power rack, a functional trainer, a lat pulldown machine, a seated cable row machine (with footplate attachment), and a pull-up station. The package also includes a pair of cable handles, a lat pulldown bar, a cable bar, a Tricep rope, and a Seated Pad, offering a complete workout solution.

INTEGRATED DUAL PULLEY SYSTEMS: The SmithΔMacine Home Trainer is equipped with two independent trolleys, allowing two users to perform a variety of exercises simultaneously. With a 1:1 cable ratio, you get the exact weight you put on, ensuring precise resistance for effective workouts. Additionally, the integrated seat pad is specifically designed for lat pulldown training, providing optimal support and comfort during exercises.

ENHANCED FAMILY TRAINING Solution: The Bi-directional Home Gym Rack is specifically designed to meet the demands of families and multiple trainers, offering dual functionalities with a Smith machine on one side and a Power Rack on the other and 2 independent pulley systems. This setup allows two or more people to work out simultaneously, efficiently addressing the needs of family or group training sessions.

BUILT TO LAST: Constructed from robust 50mm x 50mm commercial-grade steel tubing, this home gym power station ensures unmatched durability and stability. Featuring 1-inch holes and 2" by 2" tube, this trainer is compatible with most rack attachments available on the market. With dimensions of 85.8 inches (H) x 50.2 inches (L) x 66.6 inches (W), this versatile machine supports a maximum capacity of up to 2500 lbs, making it the ultimate choice for serious fitness enthusiasts.

GO-TO ATTACHMENT SET: This Home Gym Trainer comes fully equipped with all the essential attachments, included: lat pulldown bar x 1, tricep rope x 1, cable bar x 1, cable handle x 2, J-hook x 2, detachable landmine x 1, footboard x 1, band peg x 4, safety bar x 2, utility seat pad x 1, chains x 2, dip bar x 2, and spotter arm x 2. This comprehensive set of accessories makes the CS01 your go-to trainer, ready for a wide variety of exercises right out of the box.

Transform Your Home Gym, Transform Your Body 
The Smith machine is a piece of equipment commonly used in home gyms for a full body workout. It can be especially helpful for women or beginners who are new to the gym. The equipment has a barbell supported on each side and a pulley system that moves the weights. The bar moves up and down on a track, and safety bars restrict the bar from moving further than desired. The springs in the smith machine also absorb some impact, preventing injuries. 
There are several reasons why one might use a Smith machine, including: 
To become familiar with a specific exercise and its proper form before attempting it with free weights.
To isolate a particular group of muscles for strength training or to address muscle imbalances.
To prepare for an exercise that you are not yet able to do with free weights.
To alleviate nervousness about trying free weight movements, such as squats, deadlifts, or hip thrusts, for the first time.
To practice the movement pattern and foot placement and get comfortable with the bar without having to manage a standard 45-pound barbell on your shoulders or in your hands.
The Smith machine can be used in conjunction with other fitness equipment and accessories, such as a workout bench, squat rack, cable attachments, and a pull-up bar, to provide more exercise options. One can use a functional trainer with the Smith machine to do basic exercises such as cable fly, lat pulldown, horizontal bar and parallel bars, low bar pull-up, barbell deadlift, barbell squat, push-up, and pull-up. The workout bench provides more workout options, including seated leg extension, lying leg extension, upper body stretches, and incline, decline, and flat barbell chest press. The Smith machine can also be used as part of an all-in-one cage or Altas Strength home gym equipment, which includes a leg press, arm curl, and other attachments. 
Overall, the Smith machine is an excellent choice for those looking to exercise at home, as it provides a safe and effective way to target various muscle groups while minimizing the risk of injury.

items.name: Power Rack
items.text: Perform squats, bench presses, overhead presses, deadlifts, and more. The Power Rack base includes commercial-grade J-Hooks and Safeties which can be adjusted to virtually any height position you need. Removable rubber barbell protector sleeves protect your barbell knurling and extend the life of your barbell. Constructed of heavy duty gauged rolled steel tubing that is powder coated then clear coated for added durability and longevity.

items.name: Functional Trainer
items.text: The Functional Trainer and cable crossovers allow you to perform over 75 different exercises. Includes 6 functional trainer attachments and 2 x 200lb integrated weight plates located at the back of the unit for the ultimate strength training workout. Features 16 adjustable height positions to perform shoulder, arms, chest, back, core, and leg exercises.

items.name: Vertical Leg Press
items.text: The Altas Strength offers the only Functional Trainer of its kind to include a leg press attachment that you can use either on a bench or when in use on the floor.（Sold separately）

items.name: Pull-up Station
items.text: Designed Multi-Grip Chin Up and Pull Up station with a massive 800lb weight rating. Knurled grip positions include wide-grip, close grip, underhand, overhand and a variety of other varied movements.

items.name: Dip Station
items.text: The Multi-Grip Dip Handle attachments provide different width options for you to choose from. Conveniently adjusts vertically on the power rack and accepts weight belts or resistance bands.

items.name: Low Row
items.text: The vertical leg press attachment quickly transforms into a low row station footpad that combines with either cable pulley system to deliver a full-body workout.

items.name: Rotating Landmine
items.text: Includes a rotating landmine station that is suited for all types of rotational torso training and allows for a wide range of upper body training when connected to an optional barbell (not included).

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Check it out! The Panther is the ultimate destination for your home gym journey 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Does this machine come with all the bells and whistles, or do I have to buy extra stuff? 
Oh, it’s got all the bells and whistles, my friend. No need to go hunting for extra gear. You’ve got your Smith machine, pec deck, cable pulley system, pull-up bars... it’s a one-stop shop for your entire workout. Just bring your muscles. 
What’s with the 7-degree angled Smith machine? Does that actually make a difference? 
Oh yeah, big time! That 7-degree angle isn’t just for looks—it’s all about smoother, more natural movement. No more “joint grinds” that feel like you’re wrestling with the machine. You’ll feel like you're lifting with the pros. 
Can I actually fit this beast in my garage, or is it gonna need its own room? 
It’s a powerhouse, but we designed it to save space. Think of it like a Transformer—big performance, compact design. It'll fit in your garage or home gym without turning it into a circus tent. 
What’s the deal with the cable ratios? 
No calculators needed! Here's the breakdown: 
4:1 on the pulley system 
2:1 on the pec deck 
1:1 on the low row 
Mix these ratios, and you’ve got versatile training for every muscle, every angle. It’s like having a whole gym in one machine! 
Is the pec deck on this machine really as good as it sounds, or is it just a gimmick? 
Nope, no gimmicks here! The built-in pec deck is smooth, comfy, and hits your chest just right. Adjustable settings let you customize for the perfect stretch and contraction. It's like having a trainer, minus the sweat!

title: Mikolo Leg Press Machine, 45 Degree Leg Machine for Home Gym, Professional Leg Workout Machine Lower Body for Fitness and Strength Training
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Strength Training Equipment › Weight Machines › Leg Machines
features: 【Unrivaled high quality】 LP05 leg press machine made with heavy-duty high tensile steel and durable high-density foam padding,Precision welded 11 gauge steel frame ensures maximum structural integrity, adhesion and durability. All backed by a 8 months Frame Warranty, it’s time to step up your leg workouts and choose mikolo. We offer superior quality equipment with weight capacities and durability unmatched by other brands.

【Save 20% space】Take nearly 20% less space than the original leg press machine, it's one of the smallest footprint machines you could find on the market. It's small but doesn't affect use at all. The model is 6.2' and there's plenty of room to work out. The 4-position adjustable backrest can also accommodate a wider range of heights.

【Hit training goals】 This 45 degree leg workout machine is ideal for any athlete who has developed hamstrings and wants to target and strengthen their quadriceps in home gym. Built to eliminate stress on ankles, offering multi-adjustable settings and ultra-smooth travel on every leg press rep, you can precisely isolate your quads, hips, glutes and calves.

【Upgrade configuration】To give your leg muscles more strength. We added 4 additional resistance band pegs with 8 adjustable holes for resistance leg press exercise in home gym. The 4 weight loading posts underneath the pedals add extra weight to your leg training. 4 additional weight plates storage saves training space.

【Double safety guarantee】 Before the exercise starts, you need to rotate the handle to start the safety starting device, we designed 3 gears of starting leg press heights, to help you find a more suitable starting height for your own height. In addition, we are also equipped with a 8 height-choices safety limiter, It is equivalent to the safety stopper position where you can choose any one of the heights that makes you feel most comfortable to pause or stop your movement.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Why 45° "Leg press" ? 
Leg press is the best leg exercise for beginner and intermediate. Safer, easier to learn and lower impact on your joints to keep your health. 
Reason1:Why "LP05 Leg press machine" not "Press and Hack squat combo machine"? 
"Gains will lose". Most leg combo machines in order to combine the functions and use a small footboard (only for narrow leg press). LP05 equips a 19*22'' big footboard and you can do all leg core muscle exercise on it. 
Reason2:Why "LP05 Leg press machine" not "Press and Hack squat combo machine"? 
Let's do the math. LP05 equips 4x 10'' long weight pins for loading. Other combo machine only equips 2 weight pins. For leg training, you can have more weight options. 
Reason3:Why "LP05 Leg press machine" not "Press and Hack squat combo machine"? 
The aim muscles of the leg press and hack squat are similar. If you get combo machine, you are spending more budget and get repeated function. Why don't you buy a large footboard and heavier weight rating machine for your leg day and save your money?
